body_text: Should this instead use the second parameter of connect to auto-bind the action creator to dispatch, and take loadLocalColumns as a prop?
body: Should this instead use the second parameter of `connect` to auto-bind the action creator to dispatch, and take `loadLocalColumns` as a prop?
